---

## Approved Premium Styles (FrankX Brand)

Based on brand review, these styles perform best:

| Style ID | Description | Use Cases |
|----------|-------------|-----------|
| `premium-gradient` | Elegant gradients, soft glows, modern minimalism | Launches, announcements, flagship content |
| `da-vinci-technical` | Notebook sketches, technical diagrams, warm sepia | Research, architecture, deep technical |
| `3d-isometric` | Clean isometric blocks, modern UI elements | Workshops, tutorials, how-to guides |
| `business-professional` | Clean lines, corporate colors, subtle accents | Business, strategy, enterprise content |
| `focused-futuristic` | Tech HUD elements but restrained, not cluttered | AI/tech content, cutting-edge topics |

### Styles to Avoid
- **Cluttered cyberpunk** - Too busy, distracts from message
- **Cartoon/comic** - Doesn't match premium brand positioning
- **Overly abstract** - Needs clear visual communication

## Generation Details

### Model Configuration
```yaml
model: gemini-3-pro-image-preview
model_tier: pro
enable_grounding: true
thinking_level: high
resolution: high
aspect_ratio: 16:9
```

### Research Pipeline
1. **WebSearch** - Claude gathers current facts (2026 data)
2. **Style Selection** - Match content type to approved style
3. **Prompt Crafting** - 5-layer architecture (Foundation, Mood, Instrumentation, Production, Intention)
4. **Generation** - Gemini 3 Pro with grounding enabled
5. **Validation** - Brand alignment check

```yaml
image: '/images/blog/[filename]-hero.png'
```
